messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello yes we will be making a lot of money and we will buy a lot of cool shit with it

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: THAT MEANS WE GOTTA WORK HARD MY FELLOW SPESSMEN. WE GOTTA MAKE THAT DOUGH.
